name: 13 Reasons Why
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah Baker sends a set of tapes to those she says are responsible for her death.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Clay listens to the second tape and learns more about Hannah’s life.

episodes.title: The First Polaroid
episodes.synopsis: The trial begins and secrets from the past start to resurface.

episodes.title: Two Girls Kissing
episodes.synopsis: Tyler faces harassment at school, while Alex struggles with memory loss.

episodes.title: Yeah. I'm the New Girl.
episodes.synopsis: The investigation of Bryce Walker's murder begins.

episodes.title: If You're Breathing, You're a Liar
episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise as secrets are revealed in the wake of Bryce's death.

episodes.title: Winter Break
episodes.synopsis: As Liberty High prepares for the Spring Fling, old memories come back.

episodes.title: College Tour
episodes.synopsis: College interviews bring up unresolved emotions for Clay and his friends.
